mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG (BLOGNO, SUBJECT, WRITTEN, CONTENT, FILENAME, DATE, ID) VALUES (NO_BLOG.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{written}, #{content}, null, SYSDATE, #{id})
